 2017-11772017-09-22,  TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectMontréal — Pierre Elliott Trudeau International Airport Zoning Regulations
PrecisMONTRÉAL—PIERRE ELLIOTT TRUDEAU INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT ZONING REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that lands adjacent and in proximity to airports is used in a manner that is compatible with the safe operation of aircraft and of the airport; and (2) ensure that potential and future development surrounding the airport remains compatible with the safe operation of aircraft and of the airport.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0201 Publication Date: 2017-10-04
AttachmentsAttachment
